Trump is not embracing a new nuclear arms race, he is accepting reality. #Russia is in material breach of this agreement. 

Are we supposed to just pretend it isn’t true? 

And what is the point of a treaty if only one side is living up to its obligations? https://www.washingtonpost.com/world/2019/02/04/trump-embraces-new-nuclear-arms-race/
This resolution condemns President Trump for ‘precipitously’ bringing troops home from Afghanistan.

Mrs. Shelton was a second mother to me and I don’t know where I’d be without her. I’m thinking about her this #BlackHistoryMonth and the countless Black women just like her who continue to build and shape our communities. https://www.bustle.com/p/without-this-woman-i-wouldnt-be-the-senator-i-am-today-15910352

This Rosa Parks Day, let’s honor her memory by staying active in our communities and fighting against injustice when we see it. #BlackHistoryMonth http://pbs.twimg.com/tweet_video_thumb/Dykl7xmWoAA_q0o.jpg https://video.twimg.com/tweet_video/Dykl7xmWoAA_q0o.mp4

Spain, Germany, France & the U.K have now recognized @jguaido as the the legitimate interim President of #Venezuela. 

While some in media describe recognition of Guaido as a unilateral action ,it is in fact the growing international consensus.

RT @mdb2 ✔️buy a decades-old drug
✔️raise the price by $375,000
✔️promise shareholders millions
✔️hope you get away with it

The business model of big pharma is greed. What Catalyst did to the LEMS community, and to Rebecca Hovde, is wrong. https://twitter.com/sensanders/status/1092443702373556226 QT @SenSanders Catalyst Pharmaceuticals raised the price of a life-saving drug from $0 to $375,000.

Now patients are worried they are going to suffer or even die because of the greed of a drug company.

If Catalyst does not substantially lower the price of this medication, Congress must act. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DykhvjPXgAAguju.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1092440867359604736/vid/320x320/kBpJzMcKV5N6kqhp.mp4?tag=9

Honrado de que @carlosvecchio me acompañe en el Estado de la Unión mañana. El #SOTU es una gran tradición de nuestra democracia. Me enorgullece darle la bienvenida al Sr. Vecchio mientras continúa luchando por la democracia y la libertad en #Venezuela.

The average NFL salary is $2.1 million, so most players would never experience a 70% rate.

The owners who refuse to hire Kaepernick would, though. https://twitter.com/dancrenshawtx/status/1092275868133670912 QT @DanCrenshawTX Should someone propose a 70% tax on the Patriots so that NFL competition is more fair and equal? Asking for a friend.

For decades, we have had policies in this country that disproportionately benefit the top one percent to the exclusion of others. It’s time for that to change. I introduced the Rent Relief Act and the LIFT Act to help Americans make ends meet.

By rubber-stamping the Bayer-Monsanto merger, @TheJusticeDept is handing control over 1/4 of the world's seeds & pesticides market to one ginormous agribusiness. That’s bad for farmers, bad for our food supply, & bad for consumers everywhere. https://foe.org/news/doj-releases-formal-approval-toxic-mega-merger-bayer-monsanto/

Nearly 85 percent of all stocks owned by Americans belong to the wealthiest 10 percent of households. The time is long overdue for us to create an economy that works for all Americans, not just the people on top.

Spent tonight w/ @CWAUnion workers in the Bronx organizing for better work.

Did you know that the spray painted neon on NYC roads mark gas lines & other critical areas?

Those skilled workers are paid little, & can be on call 24h w/ little sleep.

Does that sound safe to you? http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DynHir8XcAAVq5i.jpg

A young man once wrote to Rosa Parks: "I wonder, will there ever be a time when all people will be treated equally? I believe that we as a people and the world are divided. I am fearful." 

Rosa Parks responded: "Let love, not fear, be our guide." 

Amen.
https://www.washingtonpost.com/archive/local/1998/12/06/rosa-parkss-healing-words-on-an-often-painful-past/cf32f62c-5411-43b4-a3c8-fc410f517fac/?utm_term=.40531dfeb902 http://pbs.twimg.com/media/Dyk-alMXQAEMx_s.jpg

I’m proud to announce that my #StateOfTheUnion guest will be @AnaMariaArchil2.

Ana Maria is the NY14-er who famously jumped into the elevator with Sen. Flake to elevate the stories of survivors everywhere.

She‘s living proof that the courage within all of us can change the 🌎. https://twitter.com/popdemoc/status/1092464188528693251 QT @popdemoc Well-behaved women rarely make history, & our own @AnaMariaArchil2 showed the world what courage & strength look like in the age of Trump.
Tomorrow night, she will join another badass woman, @AOC @RepAOC for the #SOTU.

Follow along & join them with #PeoplesSOTU✊🏾 http://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1092464067015593984/pu/img/Mwl25b1vowYwrRvq.jpg https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/1092464067015593984/pu/vid/320x180/7uFm5Cxzok9ff6ku.mp4?tag=6

I’m honored to host the Venezuelan Embassy’s Charge d’Affaires @carlosvecchio at the State of the Union. The #SOTU is a great tradition of our strong democracy, and I’m proud to welcome Mr. Vecchio as he continues to fight for democracy & freedom in #Venezuela.

It’s the honor of a lifetime to serve w/ my colleagues under the leadership of @RepCummings on Oversight and @RepMaxineWaters on Fin. Services.

Every day I know I’m blessed to represent our community in the nation’s capital. And I will forever be grateful for the responsibility. https://twitter.com/abigailtracy/status/1092563806084087808 QT @abigailtracy I spoke with @RepCummings on Friday about @AOC @RepAOC and he had nothing but good things to say: “A lot of people said that she might not be a team player, and I have found it to be just the opposite,” he told me. “She has been a breath of fresh air.” https://www.vanityfair.com/news/2019/02/aoc-house-democrats-nancy-pelosi

On Rosa Parks’ birthday, I’m honoring her legacy by recommitting myself to fight for justice & equality. The courage she embodied during the Civil Rights movement continues to give me the strength to be the joyful warrior I am today. How are you remembering Rosa Parks?

This is what being a woman in politics looks like:

Disagreements aren’t labeled as differing opinions. They’re labeled as one’s knowledge being ‘inadequate.’

As a reminder, I’m not the one who testified about Big Pharma under oath to Congress.

It was an expert witness. https://twitter.com/rcscience/status/1092588619338903552 QT @RCScience .@AOC: " Right now, your knowledge of where drugs come from appears to be seriously inadequate. To be fair, you’re definitely not alone in that, but there’s no reason not to learn more.” By @Dereklowe  https://www.realclearscience.com/2019/02/04/rep_ocasio-cortez_and_where_drugs_come_from_284625.html http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DykzJIAU0AAGRRM.jpg

Millions of Californians enjoy boating, fishing, hunting & viewing wildlife in the Sacramento-San Joaquin Delta & we must preserve that opportunity for generations to come. Today @SenFeinstein @RepGaramendi & I introduced a bill to establish the Delta as a National Heritage Area.

We don’t need to be looking around, waiting for good ideas when it comes to combating gun violence. We already have good ideas. Making background checks universal. Renewing the assault weapons ban. We can act now to make sure this violence doesn’t continue as the new normal.

Middle-class families are sick of stagnant wages & exploding costs. They're sick of a Washington that works only for the wealthy & the well-connected. They don't want to replace a self-absorbed billionaire President with another one. Americans want real change. We should listen.
So, supporters of forever war have defined coming home after 17 years as too precipitous and condemned a planned withdrawal as too deliberate.

This is horrifying & should never happen in America.
 
“…I saw a young man on the floor, holding a bright red inhaler, and he was saying through tears that he doesn’t know if he’s going to wake up tomorrow…This man is pre-trial…”  https://theintercept.com/2019/02/02/federal-prison-no-heat-new-york-nadler-mdc/

Deeply saddened to hear of the passing of Babs Siperstein, a good friend, advocate for NJ’s LGBTQ community, trailblazer & role model whose legacy will continue to change lives for years to come with the newly-enacted Babs Siperstein Law. My heart is with her loved ones.

You theory has one big problem, I filed this bill over a year ago with strong bipartisan support. 

It has only now become controversial due to opposition from the ACLU, combined with the growing influence of Anti-Israel/Pro-BDS voices on the left after the midterms. https://twitter.com/thedailybeast/status/1091818604419534848 QT @thedailybeast The anti-BDS bill isn't about boycotting Israel, it's about tearing the Democratic Party and the American Jewish community apart, says @jaymichaelson https://www.thedailybeast.com/anti-bds-bill-isnt-about-boycotting-israel-its-about-splitting-the-democratic-party?via=twitter_page&source=twitter_page_early_access

Instead of wasting billions on a wall with Mexico, tax breaks for billionaires and a bloated military budget, we need to end childhood poverty, rebuild our crumbling infrastructure, combat climate change and invest in our kids and seniors.

I want to compliment @realDonaldTrump for being bold and brave! We’ve been in Afghanistan for far too long! Let’s stop spending money there and start spending it here at home.

I’m tired of America doing everyone’s fighting. I’m tired of America paying for everyone’s wars! How about we take care of our own homeland? I’m glad @realDonaldTrump isn’t letting everyone take advantage of us! We must fight when needed, but we can’t be the world’s policeman!

Rosa Parks ignited a movement, inspired millions, and embodied the spirit that, no matter what, we can never give in, never give up, never surrender in our work for justice in this nation. Remembering her legacy today on what would have been her 106th birthday. #BlackHistoryMonth

Today on Rosa Parks' 106th birthday we must do more than just remember her lifetime of organizing. We must honor her by working to fulfill her vision of racial, economic and social justice. https://www.commondreams.org/views/2019/02/04/its-rosa-parks-birthday-lets-honor-her-legacy-continuing-her-struggle
